currentMembers.name: Dr. Uttama Mukherjee
currentMembers.info:
Women Scientist - A (WOS-A, DST)
Research Topic: CO2 capture
Email: uttama.mukherjee@acads.iiserpune.ac.in
Education: M.Sc. (Organic Chemistry), St. Andrew's College (DDU Gorakhpur University, Gorakhpur, U.P., 2004 - 2006).
Ph. D.: DDU Gorakhpur University, Gorakhpur, U.P. (2014).
Experience: 
Assistant Professor at K. B. P. College, Vashi, Navi Mumbai (2015 - 2017).
Research Editor (Chemical Sciences) at Crimson Interactive, Goregaon (W), Mumbai (2014 - 2015).
Research Chemist at TCG Lifesciences Pvt. Ltd. (formerly Chembiotek Research International) Kolkata, West Bengal (2007 - 2009).
